```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(pdftools)
```


## Read pdf

```{r}
pdf_table <- file.path("pdfs/biaa159_supplemental_file.pdf")

raw_table <- pdf_text(pdf_table)

```


## transform table

```{r}
df_table <- tibble(raw_table) %>% 
  mutate(page = 1:n()) %>%
  mutate(text_sep = str_split(text, ' ')) %>%
  unnest(text_sep)


```
